<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prevents the following code sequence from being generated:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (div/sqrt) -&gt; (2 to 3 floating-point operations or loads) -&gt; (div/sqrt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the sequence is detected one or two NOP instruction are inserted after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first div/sqrt instruction. No NOPs are inserted if one of the floating-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point instructions in the middle of the sequence is a (div/sqrt), or if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they have dependency on the destination register of the first (div/sqrt).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The function also prevents the following code sequence from being generated,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (div/sqrt) -&gt; (branch), by inserting a NOP instruction after the (div/sqrt).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errataworkaround/#a0f8cf9161e0574d4b2a6cdc426c77f8b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errataworkaround/#a0f8cf9161e0574d4b2a6cdc426c77f8b">ErrataWorkaround::checkSeqTN0013</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To prevent any explicit change of the default rounding mode, this pass</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42; FixAllFDIVSQRT pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass fixes the incorrectly working FDIVx and FSQRTx instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exist for some earlier versions of the LEON processor line. Five NOP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions need to be inserted after these instructions to ensure the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct result is placed in the destination registers before they are used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass implements two fixes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1) fixing the FSQRTS and FSQRTD instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2) fixing the FDIVS and FDIVD instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FSQRTS and FDIVS are converted to FDIVD and FSQRTD respectively earlier in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the pipeline when this option is enabled, so this pass needs only to deal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the changes that still need implementing for the &quot;double&quot; versions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of these instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixallfdivsqrt/#a575393a046882d16e9c650c9928e1117">FixAllFDIVSQRT::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixallfdivsqrt/#a61d73168ab07fd1f5674a374971a1ceb"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixallfdivsqrt/#a61d73168ab07fd1f5674a374971a1ceb">FixAllFDIVSQRT::FixAllFDIVSQRT</a>() : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/leonmachinefunctionpass/#a0cb620960343d39cbcd224c88b751063">LEONMachineFunctionPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixallfdivsqrt/#a575393a046882d16e9c650c9928e1117">ID</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: FDIVS and FSQRTS cannot be generated when this erratum fix is</span></CodeLine>
